column1: Funeral services will be held 10:00 am on Thursday June 18
column2: 2015 from the Schumacher & Benner Funeral Home & Crematory
column3: 359 King St. Pottstown. Officiating will be Reverend Chris Eshleman. Burial will be private in Highland Memorial Park
column4: Pottstown. There will be a viewing on Thursday from 9:00 to 10:00 am at the funeral home.
